languages.text: "Я? Что я сделала с Идирой?" {n}"Теодора" глумливо смеется.{/n} "Всего лишь превратила эту шавку с окраин в подлинную имперку. Дарила ей игрушки, прибирала за ее шалостями, дала все, о чем она только могла мечтать. О, у меня были большие планы на бедняжку Идиру!"

traits.locale_text: "Я? Что я сделала с Идирой?" {n}"Теодора" глумливо смеется.{/n} "Всего лишь превратила эту шавку с окраин в подлинную имперку. Дарила ей игрушки, прибирала за ее шалостями, дала все, о чем она только могла мечтать. О, у меня были большие планы на бедняжку Идиру!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"
languages.original_text: "Я? Что я сделала с Идирой?" {n}"Теодора" глумливо смеется.{/n} "Всего лишь превратила эту шавку с окраин в подлинную имперку. Дарила ей игрушки, прибирала за ее шалостями, дала все, о чем она только могла мечтать. О, у меня были большие планы на бедняжку Идиру!"

traits.locale_text: "Me? What have I done with Indira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true Imperial. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Indira!"

I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “我吗？我对伊迪拉做了什么？”{n}“西奥多拉”嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“我做的事情，不过是让那个来自偏远地区的小蠢货成为帝国真正的仆人。我给了她玩具，我在她发疯之后替她收拾烂摊子，我为她提供她梦寐以求的一切。噢，我为可怜的小伊迪拉制定了伟大的计划！”
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: “我吗？我对伊迪拉做了什么？”{n}“西奥多拉”嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“我做的事情，不过是让那个来自偏远地区的小蠢货成为真正的帝国人。我给了她玩具，我在她发疯之后替她收拾烂摊子，我为她提供她梦寐以求的一切。噢，我为可怜的小伊迪拉制定了伟大的计划！”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «¿Que qué le he hecho a Idira? ¿Yo?». {n}«Theodora» se ríe, burlona.{/n} «Lo único que hice fue convertir a esa criatura de los límites exteriores en una auténtica súbdita del Imperium. Le di juguetes, arreglé sus desastres y le di todo con lo que podía soñar. ¡Oh, tenía grandes planes para la pequeña Idira, pobrecita!».
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Que qué le he hecho a Idira? ¿Yo?». {n}«Theodora» se ríe, burlona.{/n} «Lo único que hice fue convertir a esa criatura de los límites exteriores en una auténtica imperial. Le di juguetes, arreglé sus desastres y le di todo con lo que podía soñar. ¡Oh, tenía grandes planes para la pequeña Idira, pobrecita!».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「私？私がイディラに何をしたっていうの？」{n}『シオドーラ』は嘲るように笑う。{/n}「私がしたことは、あの辺境出身の駄犬を真の帝国の従者に変えただけ。おもちゃを与え、おふざけの後始末をし、夢見るものすべてを与えた。可哀想なイディラのために、私は素晴らしい計画を立てたのよ！」
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: 「私？私がイディラに何をしたっていうの？」{n}『シオドーラ』は嘲るように笑う。{/n}「私がしたことは、あの辺境出身の駄犬を真の帝国の従者に変えただけ。おもちゃを与え、おふざけの後始末をし、夢見るものすべてを与えた。可哀想なイディラのために、私は素晴らしい計画を立てたのよ！」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ich? Was ich mit Idira gemacht habe?" {n}"Theodora" stößt ein spöttisches Lachen aus.{/n} "Ich habe aus der kleinen Göre aus den Randgebieten nur eine echte Dienerin des Imperiums gemacht. Mehr nicht. Ich gab ihr Spielzeug, habe hinter ihr aufgeräumt ... ach gab ihr alles, wovon sie je hätte träumen können. Oh, ich hatte große Pläne für die arme kleine Idira!"
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich? Was ich mit Idira gemacht habe?" {n}"Theodora" stößt ein spöttisches Lachen aus.{/n} "Ich habe aus der kleinen Göre nur eine echte Dienerin des Imperiums gemacht. Mehr nicht. Ich gab ihr Spielzeug, habe hinter ihr aufgeräumt ... ach gab ihr alles, wovon sie je hätte träumen können. Oh, ich hatte große Pläne für die arme kleine Idira!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Vous me demandez ce que j'ai fait d'Idira ? » {n}demande "Théodora" avec un éclat de rire moqueur.{/n} « J'ai pris cette misérable bâtarde des confins sous mon aile pour en faire une servante de l'Imperium à part entière. Je lui ai offert des jouets, j'ai nettoyé ses cochonneries et je lui ai donné tout ce dont elle aurait jamais pu rêver. Ah ça, on peut dire que j'avais de grands projets pour cette pauvre petite fille égarée ! »
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez ce que j'ai fait d'Idira ? {n}demande "Théodora" avec un éclat de rire moqueur.{/n} J'ai pris cette misérable bâtarde des confins sous mon aile pour en faire une citoyenne impériale à part entière. Je lui ai offert des jouets, j'ai nettoyé ses cochonneries et je lui ai donné tout ce dont elle aurait jamais pu rêver. Ah ça, on peut dire que j'avais de grands projets pour cette pauvre petite fille égarée ! »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ben mi? İdira'ya ne mi yaptım?" {n}"Theodora" alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor.{/n} "Tek yaptığım, o kancığı varoşlardan kurtarıp İmparatorluk'un has bir hizmetkârına dönüştürmekti. Ona oyuncaklar verdim, arkasını temizledim, hayal edebileceği her şeyi önüne serdim. Minik İdira için ne güzel planlarım vardı!"
languages.original_text: "Me? What have I done with Idira?" {n}"Theodora" laughs mockingly.{/n} "All I did was turn that little mutt from the fringes into a true servant of the Imperium. I gave her toys, I cleaned up after her antics, I provided her with everything she could ever dream of. Oh, I had great plans for poor little Idira!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben mi? İdira'ya ne mi yaptım?" {n}"Theodora" alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor.{/n} "Tek yaptığım şey, o iti varoşlardan kurtarıp İmparatorluğun has bir hizmetkârına dönüştürmekti. Ona oyuncaklar verdim, arkasını temizledim, hayal edebileceği her şeyi önüne serdim. Minik İdira için ne güzel planlarım vardı!"
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
